changelog:
Syberia OS for chiron updated!

Current build date: 12/29/2018
Minimum firmware required: 10.0.2.0 (latest stable)
Minimum TWRP required: 3.2.3 (wight554's one) or latest OrangeFox

Changelog:
new:
- Auto face unlock v2 (Pie)

fixed:
- Fix Signature Spoofing (MicroG)
- Fix no default ringtone for slot2
- Fix voume panel animation
- Fix an issue where unlocking the SIM PIN failed
- Fix Miracast sound

Improvements:
- OP gestures tweaks
- Improvements for render engine

Device Specific:
- Fixed loudspeaker mic
- Fixed Bluetooth Mic
- Proximity problems on stock dialer should be fixed

Download:  check OTA or visit our Downloads Portal https://syberiaos.com/downloads

#syberia #chiron #donate
